prefixSetEmbedDescription:
All future commands will use this prefix.
`Ex. {prefix}set locale`
localeUsage:
`{prefix}set locale [locale code]` Change the language of all commands/messages.

Valid locale codes:
prefixUsage: `{prefix}set prefix [prefix]` Set a new command prefix.
setUsage:
`{prefix}set prefix [prefix]` Set a new command prefix.
`{prefix}set locale [locale code]` Change the language of all commands/messages.
